IRBR3.SA.summary: IRB-Brasil Resseguros S.A., together with its subsidiaries, provides reinsurance products and services in Brazil and internationally. It offers reinsurance solutions for aviation, engineering, agricultural, and miscellaneous risks; and surety, financial lines, oil and gas, property, casualty, cargo and marine, and life and pension reinsurance solutions. The company also provides asset and real estate management services. The company was founded in 1939 and is headquartered in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.
